title: Automation
description: DApps function using smart contracts, which are automatic and self-executing codes. This results in lower transaction costs and facilitates smooth transactions.

title: Transparency
description: DApp data is stored on a public ledger, where all information is recorded publicly. This ensures protection against any data manipulation & guarantees data integrity.

title: Privacy
description: The validation of dApp users is carried out through blockchain-validated cryptography techniques that enhance user privacy and make the process more user-friendly.

title: User Governance
description: The operation of dApps is based on a consensus mechanism, thereby preventing domination or the act of gatekeeping at all costs.

title: Fault-tolerance
description: As a decentralized application, dApps eliminate the existence of a single point of failure to ensure greater stability and safety compared to conventional applications.

title: Incentivization
description: DApps provide an incentivization mechanism in the form of tokens (or digital assets), which are utilized to incentivize blockchain users and validators.
